Translations.Text: Ani tyacabarobara majhi siksa yatanahi mothi duhkhadayaka ahe
Ani tyanna ibrahimacya atithinca vrttanta aikava
Ki jevha tyanni ibrahimajavala ye'una salama kela, tevha te mhanale ki amhala tumace bhaya vatate
Phariste mhanale, bhi'u naka, amhi tumhala eka jnani putraci subha varta deto
Ibrahima mhanale, kaya ya vrd'dhavasthene sparsa kelyanantara tumhi mala hi subha varta deta! Hi anandaci batami tumhi kasi kaya deta ahata
Phariste mhanale, amhi tumhala agadi khari subhavarta aikavita ahota. Tumhi nirasa lokammadhye samila ho'u naka
Mhanale, apalya palanakartyacya daya krpepasuna kevala te (margabhrasta ani) bahakalele lokaca nirasa hotata
(Ibrahima yanni) vicarale, he allahatarphe pathavinyata alelya (pharistyam) no! Tumace ase kaya khasa kama ahe
Pharistyanni uttara dile, amhala aparadhi lokankade pathavile gele ahe
Parantu lutace kutumba ki amhi tya sarvanna avasya vacavu
Matra lutacya patnikherija ki amhi tila thambanarya va mage rahanaryammadhye niscita kele ahe
Jevha pathavilele phariste lutacya kutumbajavala pohocale
Tevha luta mhanale, tumhi loka tara kahise anolakhi vatatata
Te mhanale, (nahi) kimbahuna amhi tumacyajavala ti vastu ghe'una alo ahota, jicya babatita he loka sansaya karita aheta
Ani amhi tara tujhyajavala (ughada) satya ghe'una alo ahota, ani amhi ahotahi purepure sacce

Ata tumhi apalya kutumbasaha ya ratricya ekhadya bhagata nighuna ja. Tumhi svatah tyancya mage raha (ani savadhana!) Tumacyapaiki konihi mage valuna pahu naye ani jya thikani jayaca tumhala adesa dila jata ahe, tithe calata ja
Ani amhi tyacyakade ya gostica phaisala kela ki sakala hota hotaca tya sarvanci mule kapali jatila
Ani sahari loka motha ananda sajara karita ale
(Luta) mhanale, he loka majhe atithi aheta, tevha tumhi mala apamanita karu naka
Ani sarvasrestha allahace bhaya rakha ani mala apamanita karu naka
Te mhanale, kaya amhi tumhala sarya jagaca theka ghenyapasuna mana'i keli navhati
(Luta) mhanale, jara tumhala kahi karayaceca ahe tara ya majhya muli hajara aheta
Tumacya ayusyaci sapatha! Te tara apalya naseta dhunda phirata hote
Maga suryodaya hota hota tyanna eka bhayankara sphotacya avajane ye'una dharale
Sevati amhi tya (sahara) la ulathepalathe karuna takale ani tya lokanvara kankara pasananca varsava kela
Nihsansaya, pratyeka bodha prapta karanaryakarita yata aneka nisanya aheta
Ani hi vasti asa margavara ahe, jyavara satata ye-ja hota asate
Ani yata imana rakhanaryansathi mothi nisani ahe
Ani ayaka vastice rahanare lokahi mothe atyacari hote
Jyancyasi sevati amhi suda ghetalaca. Hi donhi sahare khulya margavara aheta
Ani hijravalyannihi paigambaranna khote tharavile
Ani tyanna amhi apalya nisanya pradana kelya hotya, parantu tari dekhila te tya nisanyampasuna mana phiravitaca rahile
Ani he loka apali ghare parvatanna koruna banavita asata, bhaya na rakhata
Sevati tyannahi sakala hota hota bhayankara citkarane ye'una gathale
Yastava tyancya konatyahi yukti kausalyane ani kamagirine tyanna kasalahi labha pohacavila nahi
Ani amhi akasanna ani dharatila ani tyancya daramyanacya samasta vastunna satyasahaca banavile ahe ani kayamata avasya yenara ahe, tevha tumhi bhalya ritine sahana karuna ghya
Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakartaca nirmana karanara ani jananara ahe
Nihsansaya amhi tumhala sata ayati pradana kelya aheta jyanci punaravrtti keli jate, ani mahana kura'ana dekhila pradana kela ahe

Tumhi kadhihi apali najara tya gostivara taku naka, jila amhi, tyancyapaiki aneka prakaracya lokanna pradana kele ahe. Tyancyabaddala tumhi duhkhahi karu naka ani imana rakhanaryansathi apalya baju jhukava (tyanna mothya snehaci vaganuka dya)
Ani sanga ki mi ughadapane bhaya dakhavinara ahe
Jyapramane amhi tya vibhajana karanaryanvara utaravila
Jyanni ya kura'anace tukade tukade karuna takale
Sapatha ahe tumacya palanakartyaci! Amhi tya sarvanna avasya vicaru
Tya pratyeka gostibabata ji te karita hote
Tevha tumhi ha adesa, jo tumhala dila jata ahe, spastatah aikava, ani anekesvaravadyampasuna tonda phiravuna ghya
Tumacyasi te loka thatta maskari karatata tyancya (sikse) karita amhi paryapta ahota
Je loka allahacya sobata anakhi itara upasye banavitata, tyanna lavakaraca mahita padela
Ani amhala cangalya prakare mahita ahe ki tyancya bolanyane tumacya manala theca pohacate
Tumhi apalya palanakartyaci mahanata ani stuti prasansace varnana karita raha ani natamastaka honaryammadhye samila vha
Ani apalya palanakartyaci upasana karita raha, yetheparyanta ki tumhala marana yave
